name: Ballies
description: At the heart of Ballies lies the Player vs. Player (PvP) Prediction Market, a high-stakes arena where sports fans compete head-to-head, making bold calls and earning rewards. The game-changing edge? AI-powered Agents integrated with NFTs, delivering unmatched predictive insights and strategic advantages. This isn’t just gaming—it’s domination through intelligence and skill, powered by cutting-edge AI and blockchain technology. Ballies goes beyond predictions, offering three dynamic verticals: Strategic Games: Outthink and outplay in titles like the Basketball Strategic Card Game. Hypercasual Games: Test your skills in Clean Sheets, where breaking records brings instant rewards. iGaming: High-stakes blockchain gameplay for thrill-seekers who play to win.
